segments.text: I think I found my Yankee's mug ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It fell out of the garbage bag .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was with all the other dishes from dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean Johnny threw out all the dinnerware ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think our son was trying to pull a fast one on us .
segments.speaker: S1
